Verses: 1 appozhudhu Yesu Pisaasinaal Sodhikkappatuvadharku Aaviyaanavaraale Vanaandharaththirkuk Kondupogappattaar.
2 avar Iravum Pagalum Naarpadhu Naal Upavaasamaayirundhapinbu, Avarukkup Pasiyuntaayitru.
3 appozhudhu Sodhanaikkaaran Avaridaththil Vandhu: Neer Dhevanudaiya Kumaaraneyaanaal, Indhak Kallugal Appangalaagumpadi Sollum Endraan.
5  Appozhudhu Pisaasu Avaraip Parisuththa Nagaraththirkuk Kondupoi, Dhevaalayaththu Upparikaiyinmel Avarai Niruththi:

6 neer Dhevanudaiya Kumaaraneyaanaal Thaazhakkudhiyum; Enenil, Thammudaiya Thoodhargalukku Ummaikkuriththuk Kattalaiyituvaar; Umadhu Paadham Kallil Idaraadhapatikku, Avargal Ummaik Kaikalil Endhikkondu Povaargal Enpadhaai Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu Endru Sonnaan.
7 adharku Yesu: Un Thevanaagiya Karththaraip Pareetchai Paaraadhiruppaayaaga Endrum Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe Endraar.
8 marupadiyum Pisaasu Avarai Migavum Uyarndha Malaiyinmel Kondupoi, Ulagaththin Sagala Raajyangalaiyum Avaigalin Magimaiyaiyum Avarukkuk Kaanpiththu:
9 neer Saashtaangamaai Vizhundhu, Ennaip Panindhukondaal, Ivaigalaiyellaam Umakkuth Tharuven Endru Sonnaan.
10 appozhudhu Yesu: Appaale Po Saaththaane; Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaraip Panindhukondu Avar Oruvarukke Aaraadhanai Seyvaayaaga Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe Endraar.
11  Appozhudhu Pisaasaanavan Avarai Vittu Vilagipponaan. Udane Dhevadhoodhargal Vandhu, Avarukkup Panividai Seydhaargal.
12  Yovaan Kaavalil Vaikkappattaan Endru Yesu Kelvippattu Galileyaavukkup Poi,
13 naasareththai Vittu, Sebulon Napthali Ennum Naadugalin Ellaigalilirukkum Kadarkaraikku Arugaana Kapparnakoomile Vandhu Vaasampanninaar.
14  Kadarkaraiyarukilum Yordhaanukku Appuraththilumulla Sebulon Naadum Napthali Naadum Aagiya Purajaadhiyaarudaiya Galileyaavile,
15 irulil Irukkum Janangal Periya Velichchaththaik Kantaargal; Marana Irulin Thisaiyilirukkiravarkalukku Velichcham Udhiththadhu Endru,
16 esaayaa Theerkkadharisiyinaal Uraikkappattadhu Niraiverumpadi Ippadi Nadanthadhu.
17  Adhumudhal Yesu: Manandhirumpungal, Paralokaraajyam Sameepiththirukkiradhu Endru Pirasangikkath Thodanginaar.

18 yesu Galileyaak Kataloramaai Nadandhu Pogaiyil, Meenpidikkiravargalaayirundha Irandu Sagodhararaagiya Pedhuru Ennappatta Seemonum, Avan Sagodharan Andhireyaavum, Kadalil Valaipottukkondirukkirapodhu, Avargalaik Kandu:
19  En Pinne Vaarungal, Ungalai Manusharaip Pidikkiravargalaakkuven Endraar.
20 udane Avargal Valaigalai Vittu, Avarukkup Pin Sendraargal.

21  Avar Avvidam Vittup Pogaiyil, Vere Irandu Sagodhararaagiya Sepadheyuvin Magan Yaakkopum, Avan Sagodharan Yovaanum Thangal Thagappan Sepadheyuvudane Padavilirundhu, Thangal Valaikalaip Pazhudhupaarththukkondirukkirapodhu, Avargalaik Kandu, Avargalaiyum Azhaiththaar.
22  Udane Avargal Patavaiyum Thangal Thagappanaiyum Vittu, Avarukkup Pin Sendraargal.

23  Pinbu, Yesu Galileyaa Engum Sutri Nadandhu, Avargaludaiya Jepa Aalayangalil Ubadhesiththu, Raajyaththin Suviseshaththaip Pirasangiththu, Janangalukku Undaayirundha Sagala Viyaadhikalaiyum Sagala Noikalaiyum Neekkich Sosdhamaakkinaar.

24  Avarudaiya Keerththi Seeriyaa Engum Pirasiththamaayitru. Appozhudhu Palavidha Viyaadhigalaiyum Vedhanaigalaiyum Adaindhirundha Sagala Piniyaaligalaiyum, Pisaasu Pitiththavargalaiyum Sandhirarokigalaiyum Thimirvaadhakkaararaiyum Avaridaththil Konduvandhaargal. Avargalaich Sosthamaakkinaar.
25  Galileyaavilum, Thekkappoliyilum, Erusalemilum, Yoodheyaavilum, Yordhaanukku Appuraththilum Irundha Thiralaana Janangal Vandhu, Avarukkup Pinsendraargal.
